attributes.action: STOP the unnecessary yearly vaccination of pets .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE demand that each pet should be assessed yearly through a health check given by a veterinary specialist. They should not be vaccinated yearly by veterinary surgeons per se. The Rabies vaccination should not be given as part of a multi vaccination schedule as this damages the immunity of  the recipient.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "STOP the unnecessary yearly vaccination of pets."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16539


Prime Minister's Office
